website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Vazee Summit v2 is packed with reliable technologies needed for long-distance runs and technical trail running. Many admired the shoe’s light construction, as well as its fast acceleration and responsive ride. The shoe also delivers a good combination of protection, comfort, and durability.
pros: Most of the users mentioned that the mesh upper of the shoe provided maximum breathability
The shoe’s Toe Protect material gained positive feedback from some runners
they said it effectively protected their toes from the damaging nature of the trail
The New Balance Vazee Summit v2 is a very comfortable shoe, said some runners
Many runners mentioned that the shoe is very fast and responsive
Few testers mentioned that the shoe gave a reliable grip on varied surfaces
One user really admired how the tongue was attached to the upper
it didn’t deviate or shift around during his run
The outsole was durable and reliable, some runners noted
It is an affordable trail running shoe, said a few purchasers
Most of the testers admired the lightweight construction of the Vazee Summit v2
cons: A couple of wearers felt that the forefoot area was too tight for their preferences
The insole has cracked after only a few uses, according to a purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Terrific obstacle course shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I just ran the Colorado 2018 full Tough Mudder in these New Balance train shoes. They fit perfectly and helped me get through 12 miles of mud and trail and to get through, under and over 20 obstacles. The NB shoes provided superb traction which was very important as the course had us tackling some steep inclines up to 12,000 feet above sea level. Equally important is how well they drained after going through the watery, muddy obstacles (e.g. Block Ness Monster, Caged, Kiss of Mud). I hosed them down the next day and they cleaned up well, looking almost brand new. I'm very impressed with the Vazee Summit shoes.
customer_reviews.author: FEO

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this, but....
customer_reviews.text: I had gone to a store to try on this same model sneakers and 8W fit me just right wearing thick socks. I usually wear 7 1/2M ,but with the medium to thick socks, I had to go up on the size. I ordered this in 8W or 8D and it was too tight and my toes were cramped too tight in the toe box, I had to return this pair. I did like the color - dark denim and alpha pink - the color combination was very striking.
customer_reviews.author: MysticalRoseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Slippery on hard floors.
customer_reviews.text: They do seem to run small, even for someone with short, stubby toes. (Since my usual size was on sale, I was hoping that previous "runs small" comments might apply to people with a Roman toe. But no, they just seem to run small.) Also, the sole provides poor traction on hard floors. I was hoping that these would also be backup shoes for work, but they were slippery on the hospital floor. The women's wide width was not as roomy as the pair of NB boys' wide width shoes that I love. Unfortunately, most of the current boys' styles look childish.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great trail shoe. Needs no “break in” but they run very small. I normally wear a 6.5 everyday shoe so a 7.5 running shoe but needed a size 8 in this shoe. Don’t be deterred by the plastics feel as that all conforms to your feet after a few runs. The inner-sock is great, however I recommend upgrading the insoles which are awful - thus the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kathy6091

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, very comfortable, very padded good quality--hard to find a wide shoe like this with a sole that has traction, so these are great. I have wide feet, and have 8.5 shoes that are to big. So I got 8.0 D and they were too small, especially short in the toes. 8.5 fits well but I would say they run small.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers, trained in and out the woods for a tough mudder race. Wore them to the tough mudder put them in the washing machine still look perfect. I would highly recommend them and they fit accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Rugged,Aggresive,Lightweight...
customer_reviews.text: Previously my wife already have it with a half size bigger and in different colorway. Since the Dark Denim/ Alpha Pink color is not available in my country, I bought this again for her birthday present and she loves it. I also own one for my daily workout, and i love its rugged aggresive/sharp styling,protection,comfort,and lightweight. Thanks Amazon for selling the shoes with good price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Citra

customer_reviews.title: which I loved! They come in wide which is fantastic because ...
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of trail running and had the previous version of these shoes, which I loved! They come in wide which is fantastic because they fit really well. I decided to switch it up and try these instead of going for the older model and I am very pleased that I did. They fit well and feel as though I can get 300-400 miles out of them without having them fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Shoe looks very nice. Drop feels minimal which is why I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: I am between a 7 and 7.5, ordered 7.5 and should’ve gone half a size up from there. Shoe looks very nice. Drop feels minimal which is why I returned them, still working on my stride and wasn’t ready for that yet, only relevant if you’re an active runner, if not then you might not care
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: Got the wide and it wasn’t wide. Insoles are non existent. Feet hurt and got blisters. Terrible shoe. Would NEVER buy this model again. Horrible. All terrain? Hell no. I gave them a shot for two weeks. And for two weeks I had the worst aching feet.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable shoe in general and of course it doesn't help with a comfort aspect either
customer_reviews.text: Very little support noted not your typical New Balance so, fit very snuggly I normally wear a size smaller and I went up a size because it said that it might run small, it was still too small. Comfort Fair only
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA SACHETTA

customer_reviews.title: ... and sized up a half size and they are perfect. I also went with the wide
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and sized up a half size and they are perfect. I also went with the wide...and usually I don't but I wanted some extra room in the toe box for custom orthotics...these are pretty narrow at the arch for custom orthotics with high arch support...but very comfortable on their own.
customer_reviews.author: SSpat

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sport shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes very much. The only thing that I don’t like is how the tongue of the shoe is sewn down on each side. It makes it more difficult to keep the tongue from sliding down in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: InnateArtist

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP LADIES!
customer_reviews.text: Based off appearance and weight these shoes are great! However, against my better judgement I didn't size up as suggested. I opted for my usual size 6 since it was $10 cheaper and the reviews weren't kidding. These run SMALL. I am a small size 6, can sometimes fit a 5.5, and I could wear a 7 in these. They are tight and too short on my tiny feet, but cute and very lightweight (see photo). I would size up and entire size if you are ordering these. You will thank me later. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Leeanna M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Best sport shoe I have ever had! I love the color. I ordered them in the black and olive also because they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: InnateArtist

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best New Balance shoes I have ever owned. They are light weight, yet sturdy. I purchased these shoes when experiencing a foot problem. These shoes are a perfect fit and helped with aiding support to my foot while it healed. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: The material conforms to the foot but then constricts. After twenty minutes my toes were burning with lack of blood flow. My biggest issue is that there was no invoice or return info in the box. The shoes were expensive and I am unable to return a product that I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: Super nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super nice shoes. Lightweight and Bouncy, great traction for all sorts of outdoor terrain, v cushiony, v flexible Have a nice low key look to them Idk about that $107 price tag I'm seeing now tho, these were forty something when I bought them from this listing
customer_reviews.author: moonlicker

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very happy with them. Especially like the toe protect. I do something with my big toes, some pronating thing that puts holes in my shoes within six months. Don't think that's going to happen for quite a while with these.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely narrow. and fit very small on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely narrow. and fit very small on your feel. Not small in length, just small in width. I wear a size 7 and thats what I ordered. I put them on and my feet looked the size of a 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy1187

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Disliked too tight , hard , and not a running shoe which I was looking forward to
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gill

customer_reviews.title: I ordered up a half size, still way too ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered up a half size, still way too small. I’m a new balance wearer so surprised at the very small sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so much I ordered a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: GALACTIC MYTH

customer_reviews.title: easy to dust off dirt from hikes
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to dust off dirt from hikes. Great colors too, I typically buy black trainers so this was a departure for me and I'm really happy I gave them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Chaney E Cox

customer_reviews.title: great shoes but run small
customer_reviews.text: i really like these shoes. I have worn the Vazee series shoes for years now, and i always wore a 6.5. but these are definitely at least a half size too small!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable runners. They come slightly small, so I had to order 1/2 size larger than my usual size
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: they are so small for me and it was my ...
customer_reviews.text: they are so small for me and it was my snickers size, i hope next time i choose well, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Shoe feels great but its a bit small and it gave me ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe feels great but its a bit small and it gave me a blister in the back of both feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Mora

customer_reviews.title: Order larger size for best fit
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said shoe was smaller than expected. I ordered a half size bigger and the wide style...PERFECT fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ardis Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs slightly small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I've had them a couple of months and wear them all the time. I did have to order a 1/2 size bigger so they do run just a little short. I have to order wide shoes and the wide width (D) is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but ran a little small. Definitely go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: size is off, small
customer_reviews.text: I stopped buying New Balance as the soles just didn't last as long (I walk gravel/asphalt about 4 miles/day). Liked the look of these, but they run too short in length. I ordered the 11 which is supposed to be a 43. Normally I wear 10.5/42. My toes are right up against the end. Would order the size 12, but not for $99, twice as much as the 11! Not sure if I'll keep them or not. Felt comfy otherwise. The tongue is connected to the shoe, kind of in a gusset fashion, I suppose to keep rocks out better; seems ok.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Just bought my second pair, as I quite literally ran my first pair into the ground. I do a lot of hybrid trail-to-street runs, so this type of shoe is perfect for me. It's got great traction for the trails -no slipping- but not so much traction that it makes my feet stick to the pavement. They're lightweight, durable, comfy (fairly neutral fit). Will be buying a third generation!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Vazee Summit V2 Trail Running Shoe Runner
product_meta.description: Not legally approved - designed for the technical trail runner who wants a shoe that fits like a second skin, and delivers the speed and agility of a formula-one race car. In the new Vazee summit V2, features like toe protect and a rock stop plate will provide you exceptional protection in the harshest of terrains; while a one piece midsole of REVlite delivers an incredibly lightweight and responsive ride, and don't worry about wet surfaces, with a full length piece of hydro-hesion rubber outsole you can taúh

specifications.Item model number: Vazee Summit V2 Trail Running Shoe-W
